text: A Christmas Carol is a 1960 British theatrical short based on the 1843 novella by Charles Dickens. ==Cast== *Bruce Anderson as Marley's Ghost *Stuart Brown as Bob Cratchit *John Hayter as Scrooge *Gordon Mulholland as Scrooge's Nephew ==External links== * *A Christmas Carol at BFI Category:1960 films Category:1960 short films Category:British Christmas films Category:British films Category:Films based on A Christmas Carol Category:1960s Christmas films Category:British black-and-white films
title: A Christmas Carol (1960 film)
